name: Flipside
description: Executes a SQL query on Flipside and retrieves the blockchain data
introductoryText:
![Flipside](data:image/png;base64,)
### Flipside crypto connector
#### Executes a SQL query on Flipside and retrieves the data
Flipside data tables schema docs can be found [here](https://docs.flipsidecrypto.com/our-data/data-table-documentation)
####

options.name: key
options.title: API key
options.description: Get your API key from your Flipside account page

options.name: query
options.title: SQL query
options.description: Flipside uses Snowflake dialect, similar to PostgreSQL
